com.example.hivefrontend.ui.profile

Class ProfileFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • com.example.hivefrontend.ui.profile.ProfileFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, IProfileView

    public class ProfileFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements IProfileView
    Fragment showing the logged in user's profile. Accessible from the rightmost tab of the bottom navigation.
